column1: Uchi////- Brussels Sprouts: I've heard lots of good comments about this but the fried Brussels was a bit bitter
column2: oily and very salty. I think they overused the caramelized fish sauce (which made the dish different but also killed it
column3: to my taste). Better place to try: Salty Sow Austin or very similar to the taste without the salty: Tiger Den Ramen.
